website_summaries.verdict: This iron griddle is a good for anyone who prefers a large cooking surface; otherwise the weight and size don't justify paying the higher price.
pros: Stands our for its spacious surface that makes it handy for preparing large volumes of food
cons: Heavier than most, which is both a testament to it's craftsmanship and feature that makes it awkward for some to use
On the higher end of the price scale

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron grill/griddle arrived in perfect condition and fit my Camp Chef 2 burner stove ...
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron grill/griddle arrived in perfect condition and fit my Camp Chef 2 burner stove like a glove. It's heavy and distributed the heat nicely. I cooked close to 100 pancakes on it two days after it came. It comes pre-seasoned but I still shot a small amount of PAM. I had a friend with the 3 burner Camp Chef and grill/griddle cooking right next to me. He bought a hand held laser targeting infrared thermometer at Harbor Freight for less than $30 that can tell you when you are at 375 degrees which is perfect for pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul from Sanger, CA

customer_reviews.title: WAY too large for my purposes - Poor research on my part
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small cast iron griddle for using on my (Weber) grill and (Coleman) camp stove. I read over the reviews of the Camp Chef griddle and made my purchase based on the many favorable reviews. I SHOULD have paid attention to the dimensions of this griddle. It is HUGE -and- VERY heavy....It -barely- fits in my Weber Genesis II grill with NO room to spare...and forget about using it on a small Coleman (etc) two burner stove. Otherwise, it appears to be a quality product and if you are looking for an industrial strength griddle, large enough to feed the entire deer camp - This is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie P

customer_reviews.title: Fits Camp Chef stoves perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Camp Chef stove and needed a replacement griddle. The old one was cast aluminum and warped. This one fit PERFECTLY and it so nice. Husband loves the cast iron. It's nice that one side is grated and the other side is smooth. Those dinging this because it doesn't fit their inside stove....it's not sized and meant for that. Our outside stove is now complete and we use this often for grilling and other cooking needs. Two thumbs up and FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.author: R.Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy griddle. I use it at least once per week.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on in an outdoor kitchen and I have to say, I love this thing. It's created a Saturday morning tradition of griddled bacon-n-eggs and is a pleasure to use for the job. It's pretty stout so there's a lot of thermal mass which make temperature control very nice. It has a built-in grease tray so easy to contain the grease and clean up later. I recommend you have a good scraper or suitable spatula.
customer_reviews.author: JamesM

customer_reviews.title: THIS GRIDDLE GETS HOT, don't turn your back to it😉😁😂
customer_reviews.text: I burned the back of my stovetop w/ this here this magnificent piece of make a mess of burgers. I made a month of lunch for my son bc I got this griddle having all the fun I have when I get to really cook I had 6 burgers onions &mushrooms the buns & me back turned to address the cheese turned around melted the whole backside of my stovetop & made some of the best burgers on the planet
customer_reviews.author: queen culinaire

customer_reviews.title: good quality but heavy
customer_reviews.text: very nice high quality. love the size. its large enough to fit over 4 burners at once. only issue is the weight. while that makes it a higher quality, it also makes it almost too heavy to handle. very hard to move around. also - if used on stovetop, its too hot and too heavy after using to move so you can't use your stovetop for anything else until it has cooled down enough to move.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but fits my Weber summit 4 burner grill
customer_reviews.text: I run 3 burners (the ones under the griddle), medium setting is more than hot enough for a package of bacon and a few sausage patties with room to spare. The latent heat of the cast iron is extreme, clean up everything else before attempting to clean this griddle. I cleaned it with hot water and a Lodge plastic scraper (you will find them on Amazon search "Lodge Pan Scrapers. Handheld Polycarbonate Cast Iron Pan Cleaners") FYI: These scrapers will not scratch most non-stick pans as well.
customer_reviews.author: TomOinGburg

customer_reviews.title: CampFire Chef, Reversible grill & griddle 24"
customer_reviews.text: I received this in 2 days. Beautiful and prefect for grilling atop my Gold UniFlame BBQ 3 burner. I noticied all the new BBQs are coming out with solid top griddles and grills making them easier to clean and stop having food and grease falling throught the open grills into the gas line and bottom of the BBQs. Makes them easier to clean and more efficient not burning the meats. Much healthier also since charred meat is not healthy. I was lucky to find this size 16" x24". Nearly covers the entire area. I didn't have to spend $475 buying a new BBQ just to get the solid grill.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vanzant

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it, because the one I had before was too small. This one fits perfectly inside my Weber (actually better than what they sell on their website. It's extremely thick and heavy (GOOD!), it has some minor unevenness that can be polished out with some power tools. The reason for the 4 stars is that I had to ask for replacement. The 1st once came with a crack right out of the box. Amazon took care of the shipping and the replacement, but it's heavy and taking it to the UPS store was a hassle and shows a questionable QC.
customer_reviews.author: LAZ

customer_reviews.title: Big griddle- cooks well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Fathers Day and it’s been awesome. We have used the smooth side for pancakes and bacon and used the other side for kebobs and burgers. It takes the cast iron a little bit to heat up but the food is amazing. My husband says this griddle has been his missing ingredient. We clean it with a chain link and it’s not been a problem. The only issue we ran into was the grease piling up while cooking. We fixed that by drilling a hole in the corner for it to drain. I’d definitely buy this griddle again. For its size, it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomford

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before Easter weekend but the camp chef grill didn't arrive on time so we got to use this for the first time this weekend. Cracked on first use so we couldn't even use. For such a high price I'd definitely expect better quality & now the return window has closed so we're stuck with a broken grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality cast iron griddle ever!
customer_reviews.text: It fit over all 4 burners on the stove and worked amazing. I love the fact you can even flip it over to cook steak etc. It is very heavy and has a grease catcher in the front. I am blown away by this! Time for a chest grabber but it will be so worth it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect griddle
customer_reviews.text: Extreme quality cast iron and very underpriced. This unit fits perfectly on a my W Genesis Silver C gas grill allowing me to cook stinky food outdoors or on my cook top inside. I can now cook an entire pack of bacon without having to cut them up and wait all morning on my cast iron skillet. There is a small grease drain on the griddle side, but no grease trap on the griddle side. After rendering a pack of bacon, I simply folded a paper towel and cleaned it out. Perfect for bacon on my grill or stir fry on the cook top.
customer_reviews.author: justin e.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase to fry eggs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this griddle specifically to allow more room to fry eggs on my gas countertop. It fits well over 4 burners. It's very heavy. All eggs stick regardless of the type of oil used. Cleaning is not easy and leaves a residue. I'd be concerned about pancakes as well. For meats, should be good.
customer_reviews.author: TheTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I did not find the surface too rough, as some reviews have claimed. This is a solid grill and griddle I use at home and while camping now, and it became the griddle of choice for everyone I went camping with last time, except for when they used charcoal grills. I used flax seed oil for seasoning. I would buy this again in a heart beat, great product, and highly recommended. I use it over my Coleman dual burner fold n go stove, and when I replace that I will be looking specifically for a grill/burner system to accommodate this griddle even better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Araujo

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect over my whole stove stop
customer_reviews.text: not heavy for cast iron it's only 15lbs not 24 I went to actual retailer website, fits perfect over my whole stove stop. gas with 4 burners and a warmer burner in between. I was a little wary of other reviews stating theirs cracked but mine is nice and sturdy I use it daily sometimes 2X a day we are a family of 9 and I can get breakfast done in half the time now!! I am sooo happy with my griddle, it was fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a compromise
customer_reviews.text: I have another much larger grill which makes this one look small with low walls. But it fits my propane grill with some room to spare. I like it but I cannot cook much on it; but it’s a compromise to utilize my grill. I’ve used it three times. I’m Learning its nuances, having to use my spatulas with less flair.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes H. Benink Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Big, heavy gauge, cast iron griddle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cast iron griddle because it was the largest I could find on Amazon. It is a heavy gauge cast iron so it holds heat well. I use it on my outdoor gas grill for cooking everything. It distributes the heat, eliminates flare ups, and provides crispy exteriors.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Bought by accident
customer_reviews.text: But it's the best thing I ever did for my grilling! Holy goodness mother of steaks, burgers, and asparagus!! Whoever tries to use this thing on their indoor stove needs to be committed. Heavy as your mother. Grind the flat surface with 220 grit with an angle grinder and season, or not, doesn't really matter..
customer_reviews.author: Ross Garmoe

customer_reviews.title: Unconventional Fireplace Back Plate
customer_reviews.text: After searching high and low for an affordable and correct size cast iron back plate for our wood-burning fireplace, we finally decided to try this griddle. It's cheaper than most cast-iron back plates, better than using another metal, and the best part is that it fits our small fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: A. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it, needed it to work out for my family......
customer_reviews.text: But unfortunately mine cracked the first time heat was applied on the camp stove. Loud bang and crack about 1/2 way across the griddle. Returned once back from our camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as any. High point is great size.
customer_reviews.text: As with most cast iron products today you have to sand down the roughness and season it well before considering cooking stick free.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried since all the comments of cracking. But mine seems fine. Seasoned 4 more times before using then make some smash burgers so was as hot as could be over 600 and worked great. Fit my grill perfectly. Only about half and inch on all sides. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: c2s

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my gas grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it fits nicely on my gas grill without losing much cooking space. I’ve done burgers and steaks on it, and they come out perfect. I took one point off because the surface is rougher than my other cast iron cookware. It makes it harder to clean and harder to season.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Geraci

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy griddle that fit perfectly on my Char Broil grill, helps cook meat a lot better without the messy flare ups that can be a headache. Keep it "seasoned" and clean to prevent the rust. Also great for cooking fajitas, plenty of room for 4 pounds of fajita mix.
customer_reviews.author: D. Arney

customer_reviews.title: H-E-A-V-Y Pan!
customer_reviews.text: H-E-A-V-Y giant griddle! Seasoned it with a light coat of avocado oil in the oven at 425 for 45 min. Nothing sticks to it now & we love it! So big I just used it to sear full pork loins on my stovetop before finishing in the oven!
customer_reviews.author: J. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: How does a cast iron griddle get damaged by FedEx when the shipping box shows no evidence of damage?
customer_reviews.text: Answer : The cast iron griddle was packaged damaged and then shipped out! Let the pictures speak for themselves. Shame Shame Shame. Does Camp Chef or whoever makes this griddle have a functioning ‘Quality Assurance’ Department? Needless waste of time and energy to have this item shipped and returned. I can’t bring myself to re-order after reading the plus 3,2,1 reviews.
customer_reviews.author: cvenus

customer_reviews.title: Fits grill just right
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy cast iron. Held heat very well. It is large enough to cook several things at once, which is what I was looking for. Excellent addition to an outdoor grill for cooking items that would fall through the grates.
customer_reviews.author: RJS

customer_reviews.title: Great for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy and durable. I bought this for my double burner campchef stove thinking it was for that. Which was disappointing to find out it didnt work (wasn't long enough)for the double burner but it worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ekblad

customer_reviews.title: Reversible Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Griddle 24"
customer_reviews.text: Griddle came with a very ruff stippling. I sanded it smooth with a rotary sander then re-seasoned 3 times. Now it has a great smooth cooking service. Still a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tovani

customer_reviews.title: It weighs like 20 lbs
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is... it a mammoth of a griddle....if you have a big family and want to make breakfast all at once? This thing is no joke! It weighs like 20 lbs!!! Works fantastic however.... it's not something you want to use everyday... way way waaaay too big..lol but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This came on time and was exactly as described by the seller. It is a very heavy duty, and very heavy, cast iron griddle. We tried it out on our gas stove inside the house to make pancakes bacon, sausage, hashbrowns and eggs. It was wonderful to only have to dirty one pan. It worked great and cleaned up easy. I am excited to use it while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle. Love that is is a flip type ...
customer_reviews.text: Great griddle. Love that is is a flip type as my last one was not and only half was a flat griddle while the other half was ribbed. It only has a grease catch on the flat side. The heat on this is even and I have not found any hot/cold spots with it. It is very heavy (expected) and it did come with a bag. Not the best bag but that was unexpected so any bag was a bonus to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamez Barton

customer_reviews.title: Big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very heavy. It is not preseasoned as advertised. It will need to be seasoned. Wipe down with veggie oil when not in use. Once seasoned it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McCall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle and use it for most of my cooking. I thought the rough surface would be a problem but after seasoning it a bit more everything cooks perfectly. Clean up is nothing more than a wipe down with a wet rag, drying it then brushing it with a small amount of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Janel M. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: CRACKED ON SECOND USE. GREAT FIRE HAZRD.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND. Delivered 20 April 2020. Used twice. Very rough cooking service on grill. Today, 22 June, 2nd use, grill cracked. The crack is large enough to permit grease to fall onto the burners, GREAT FIRE HAZARD.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Use flat griddle for turkey or ham melts, toast bread & butter, etc. Use ribbed side for grilling veggies. Super handy & versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus Funk

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first one, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cast iron griddle to use for cooking some meats. Item received was in good shape. I went to heat up the cast iron and before long a loud pip was heard and a crack like the Liberty Bell formed. I contacted the manufacturer and sent a couple of pictures. Within three days a replacement griddle arrived. Great customer service and a great product. Haven't had any issues with the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Professional results
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a grill that could cook bacon eggs hash browns and pancakes for 4 people at the same time well this unit made it possible, you have to be a very strong person to lift this unit , it uses four burners on my stove but I am a very happy camper, I am able serve hot food for 4 people at the same time. I recommend this grill
customer_reviews.author: Jaime  Penuela

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feel like quality cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feel sturdy and well made. But I haven’t use it yet. Will come back and change rating if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Ele

customer_reviews.title: Love my cast iron griddle!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I have a huge cook surface for my family of nine. I use it in my gas stove and cooking hamburgers, eggs, pancakes is so much easier!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: that would be perfect for stovetop use
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a griddle for my stove that wasn't puny. Well, it's not, but darn if the thing isn't just as huge as the dimensions say. It seems very well constructed and deserves a 4-star review. But I do really wish someone would make a 22" x 15" griddle with no grease tray; that would be perfect for stovetop use!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: Love this griddle! The size is perfect for an entire meal to cook in one place. Heavy but cleans easily and I feel this will hold up for year's! Will definitely continue to purchase camp chef products!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Reversible Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Griddle 24"
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked this but it wasn't big enough for my stove and any bigger the cost goes way up
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Great Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a cast iron grill for pricey Dacor stove - theirs were aluminum and $375! Camp chef was a relative bargain and works great. Only knock is it is really heavy - which is expected...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: It either arrived cracked or the crack became visible with the first use. I wanted to love it. But it's going back
customer_reviews.author: Fred H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great griddle! I've cooked everything from burgers to breakfast on this & it has been great! The ONLY bad thing I can say about it, is the "factory" seasoning job was not to my standards so I started over. But honestly, I expected that.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Tech

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean, its partly seasoned. It is nice and heavy and it fit my grill perfect.
customer_reviews.author: IRican

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if the size fits your need
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this almost a year ago and just figured i would say it is well worth the cost. I do wish it was four inches wider and four inches longer to 100% utilized the heat from the gas range but as it is i love it. I also sanded the smooth side to make it easier to "clean" in the long run. No warp after a year and i tend to run it super hot for searing prior to roasting.
customer_reviews.author: erik hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a griddle man now, got rid of the BBQ. What a hassle to clean. But with this, bring it in the house, put it in the sink and walla, clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Griddle !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cast iron value! Fits right on top of my Weber Grill, and I can still close the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Turns your outdoor grill into a griddle
customer_reviews.text: After it was property cured, it griddled like a top notch griddle. The bigger the better! Turns your grill into the breakfast surface you need to feed lots of hungry tailgaters.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Grilling Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: It's BIG, it's HEAVY, it does a GREAT JOB. Preheated, it will sear your steaks, and cook your veggies quickly. And, seasoned well, it fairly easy clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my gas grill and stove
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking breakfasts for the family. This griddle works perfectly on my gas stove and on my gas grills. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent barbecue griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Weber Genesis grill and I'm able to grill complete camping breakfast (sausage, eggs, and pancakes) or dinner (sauteed vegetables, potatoes, and cut of meat) for two, and we can now both eat at the same time. Just give it adequate time to properly preheat - don't expect it to heat quickly or the risk will be warping or cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flat top
customer_reviews.text: Grillmark steaks on one side, flat top on the other. Used it on a Wolf 6 burner, it just covered two burners and wow, great heat dispersion. if you prefer cast to steel tops, this is your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it nice and big exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill, but it is really heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made grill. But it is HEAVY. Too heavy for my ladies to handle they say when it is hot. Had to return, but for me, I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This fits just right over my gas stove. I cooked hibachi and it turned out awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the grill
customer_reviews.text: love this for fish or veggies or even pancakes on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron griddle was not tempered
customer_reviews.text: Although this griddle can cook a pound of bacon at a time, it has a major design flaw. The manufacturer did not temper this capacious slab of cast iron. So while enjoying the normal popping and splattering noises of bacon being rendering into luscious breakfast meat, I suddenly heard an explosion. Someone had fired a 50-caliber round into my kitchen at short range! Ok, no. It was just my new griddle. It had cracked right down the middle. Cast iron items must be "tempered" at the factory post-casting. This object probably was not. I can't recommend it, because the resulting crack lets cooking grease drip right over the burners.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Robbins

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: WORKS WELL BUT NEED A HOLE FOR GREASE CATCHER, JUST A SMALL AREA FOR GREASE
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 for the Senior Center to use, and when the BBQ went out for the Family Night Bingo-we grabbed these and fried the hamburgers! Not only did they work perfectly-the hamburgers were super yummy!!! They were easy to clean, too!
customer_reviews.author: Corri Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cracked the first time used.
customer_reviews.text: This griddle cracked the first time I used it. Now I have to go through the hassle of contacting camp chef to see if they will back this product up. It was in my garage for over the time limit to return before it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle!
customer_reviews.text: Using this on our grill outside for mainly bacon and omelets. Works great!! We bring it inside to store it and it's nice to have the storage bag. Great product and I'm glad we got it. Its just a little short for our pit, but we don't care cause it's huge and big enough for all the food we want to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: W4

customer_reviews.title: cracked, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: While cleaning it and seasoning it for the first time it cracked dead in the center along the top. Good 3 inch crack. My husband had to weld it and repair it while on the road. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C

customer_reviews.title: do not try to steam items on it it will crack and warp
customer_reviews.text: It is heave duty which makes it hard to load and unload from storage
customer_reviews.author: Roy I Jones

customer_reviews.title: Super quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Need to make sure you follow instructions to “cure” prior to using (easy to do).
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really nice and works awesome on my grill. My only complaint is that there is no good way to drain the grease. If you are cooking a lot of burgers the grease trap can overflow and could potentially start a grease fire.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mishoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying this!! I’ve used both side and it cooks great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love cooking with cast iron, and this is no exception. I actually lay this griddle over 2 gas burners and have the option of using one or both, depending on the size of my meal. Easy to care for, but make sure you research how to properly care for cast iron. Mine is nicely seasoned now and the only cleaning it requires is a quick wipe with a wet cloth while it's still warm. Nice quality product and the size was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: CDS75951

customer_reviews.title: great item for price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, use it whilst camping and absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.....
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed the size was perfect and fit my burners perfectly. However it cracked after the first day of use on a week long camping trip I was unable to cook with it after that very disapointing. Requesting an exchange or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Majit

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing griddle/grill combo. We mainly just use the griddle because our Camp Chef came with a grill box. It was super easy to get it seasoned and we hardly ever cook in the RV anymore. I have had zero problems with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron grill = Quality
customer_reviews.text: We just love this cast iron griddle Fits our outdoor grill perfectly Super heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. For the price it’s a great deal. I’ve cooked everything on it at this point and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: griddle cracked second time it was used
customer_reviews.text: The griddle was very heavy.But it cracked almost in half the second time we used it.Also not easy to clean,being so large and heavy
customer_reviews.author: daniel c.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on first use
customer_reviews.text: Mine cracked on the first use. Bought ahead of time for a camping trip. Return window closed....
customer_reviews.author: Lucy loves Kiyo

customer_reviews.title: Cooks perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice not to have two small griddles going at once. It is even heat without hot or cold spots and cooks everything evenly. Makes us better cooks with ease.
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Matenus

customer_reviews.title: I use it on my gas stove and it works great. I can cook an entire breakfast on it
customer_reviews.text: I don't take all day to cook pancakes now. I use it on my gas stove and it works great. I can cook an entire breakfast on it. I would suggest buying the cleaning pad suggested. It makes cleaning much easier.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with my gas grill flaring up and burning multiple types of food and although this did not fit perfectly, was no problem laying flat on top of old grates. Food cooks evenly and no flares. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: d h

customer_reviews.title: Returned! Disappointed

product_meta.title: Reversible Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Griddle 24"
product_meta.description:
Size:One Size

Camp Chef: The Way to Cook Outdoors

Cook sausage and pancakes for breakfast and grilled burgers for lunch. Versatility and maximizing space is important when it comes to outdoor cooking and the Reversible Cast Iron Grill and Griddle can do it all. This cast iron grill/griddle heats evenly and holds heat well, making it easy to cook your food to perfection. Pre-seasoned with Camp Chef’s “True Seasoned Finish,” this grill/griddle has a natural cooking surface that is ready to use out of the box. Features:


• Double-sided grill/griddle combo lets you griddle breakfast, then flip it over and grill dinner

• Out of the box ready to cook in seconds

• Cast iron grilling ridges allow you to grill like on a BBQ

• Molded on handles for easy gripping while moving

• True Seasoned Finish cast iron grill/griddle holds the heat and sears the meat to cook better

• Fits all Camp Chef 16" stoves
Specifications


• Cooking Surface Dimensions: 16" x 24"

• Cooking Area: 384 sq in.

• Material: Preseasoned cast iron

• Weight: 14 lbs
